org.apache.ambari.server.controller.internal

Class URLStreamProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.controller.internal.URLStreamProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StreamProvider

    public class URLStreamProvider
extends Object
implements StreamProvider
    URL based implementation of a stream provider.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  URLStreamProvider.AmbariHttpUrlConnectionProvider
      A default implementation of HttpURLConnectionProvider, this class will use the URLStreamProvider in order to provide an HttpURLConnection which is able to use Ambari's cookie store, truststore, and timeout values.

    • Constructor Detail

      • URLStreamProvider

        public URLStreamProvider(int connectionTimeout,
                         int readTimeout,
                         ComponentSSLConfiguration configuration)
        Provide the connection timeout for the underlying connection.
        Parameters:
        connectionTimeout - time, in milliseconds, to attempt a connection
        readTimeout - the read timeout in milliseconds
        configuration - configuration holding TrustStore information

      • URLStreamProvider

        public URLStreamProvider(int connectionTimeout,
                         int readTimeout,
                         String trustStorePath,
                         String trustStorePassword,
                         String trustStoreType)
        Provide the connection timeout for the underlying connection.
        Parameters:
        connectionTimeout - time, in milliseconds, to attempt a connection
        readTimeout - the read timeout in milliseconds
        trustStorePath - the path to the truststore required for secure connections
        trustStorePassword - the truststore password
        trustStoreType - the truststore type (e.g. "JKS")

                                    String requestMethod,
                                    String body,

        Get a URL connection from the given spec.
        Parameters:
        spec - the String to parse as a URL
        requestMethod - the HTTP method (GET,POST,PUT,etc.).
        body - the body of the request; may be null
        headers - the headers of the request; may be null
        Returns:
        a URL connection
        Throws:
        IOException - if the URL connection can not be established
